text: wonderful thank you so much sigh right
so thank you everyone for joining us
today at this very first edition of the
kubernetes forum in Seoul in South Korea
and one important note there are not any
co-located events happening tomorrow so
day two was an opportunity for the
community to host events and on this
occasion we didn't have anybody signing
up to run some host events but perhaps
next time you'll want to set one up but
basically don't come back tomorrow now
our next stop for the kubernetes forums
will be in India will be in Bengaluru on
February the 17th and 18th and then
Delhi in February 20th to 21st the
schedule is going to be announced later
this week and sponsorships are still
available and then of course there are
coupons so we have Q con Europe in
Amsterdam sponsorships are still
available registration is open and the
schedule will be announced early in the
new year
and then the next event is China in July
we'll be headed back to Shanghai for Q
con cloud native con and the open source
summit so a combination of three great
conferences the CFP and registration
will be open in January so if you've
been inspired today to submit talks of
your own that's the F P is coming up
early next year you can also apply for
sponsorship already and then our last
stop for coop con next year it will be
in Boston in Massachusetts
November 17th to the 20th so it's
probably going to be about as cold there
as it is here CFP and registration for
that event
clover opens in April so your next stop
downstairs on the third floor if you go
back to the show
sponsor showcase we'd love to see you
there to join us
or some food and drink and to celebrate
the end of what I hope you would agree
has been a marvelous kubernetes forum
thank you very much and we hope to see
you again
[Applause]
